chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: A Psalm of David, when he changed his behaviour before Abimelech; who drove him away, and he departed.
items.plainText: A Psalm of David, when he changed his behaviour before Abimelech; who drove him away, and he departed.

items.text: I will bless the LORD at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth.
items.plainText: I will bless the LORD at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth.

items.text: My soul shall make her boast in the LORD: the humble shall hear thereof, and be glad.
items.plainText: My soul shall make her boast in the LORD: the humble shall hear thereof, and be glad.

items.text: O magnify the LORD with me, and let us exalt his name together.
items.plainText: O magnify the LORD with me, and let us exalt his name together.

items.text: I sought the LORD, and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears.
items.plainText: I sought the LORD, and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears.

items.text: They looked unto him, and were lightened: and their faces were not ashamed.
items.plainText: They looked unto him, and were lightened: and their faces were not ashamed.

items.text: This poor man cried, and the LORD heard him, and saved him out of all his troubles.
items.plainText: This poor man cried, and the LORD heard him, and saved him out of all his troubles.

items.text: The angel of the LORD encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.
items.plainText: The angel of the LORD encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.

items.text: O taste and see that the LORD is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.
items.plainText: O taste and see that the LORD is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.

items.text: O fear the LORD, ye his saints: for there is no want to them that fear him.
items.plainText: O fear the LORD, ye his saints: for there is no want to them that fear him.

items.text: The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the LORD shall not want any good thing.
items.plainText: The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the LORD shall not want any good thing.

items.text: Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the LORD.
items.plainText: Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the LORD.

items.text: What man is he that desireth life, and loveth many days, that he may see good?
items.plainText: What man is he that desireth life, and loveth many days, that he may see good?

items.text: Keep thy tongue from evil, and thy lips from speaking guile.
items.plainText: Keep thy tongue from evil, and thy lips from speaking guile.

items.text: Depart from evil, and do good; seek peace, and pursue it.
items.plainText: Depart from evil, and do good; seek peace, and pursue it.

items.text: The eyes of the LORD are upon the righteous, and his ears are open unto their cry.
items.plainText: The eyes of the LORD are upon the righteous, and his ears are open unto their cry.

items.text: The face of the LORD is against them that do evil, to cut off the remembrance of them from the earth.
items.plainText: The face of the LORD is against them that do evil, to cut off the remembrance of them from the earth.

items.text: The righteous cry, and the LORD heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.
items.plainText: The righteous cry, and the LORD heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.

items.text: The LORD is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.
items.plainText: The LORD is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.

items.text: Many are the afflictions of the righteous: but the LORD delivereth him out of them all.
items.plainText: Many are the afflictions of the righteous: but the LORD delivereth him out of them all.

items.text: He keepeth all his bones: not one of them is broken.
items.plainText: He keepeth all his bones: not one of them is broken.

items.text: Evil shall slay the wicked: and they that hate the righteous shall be desolate.
items.plainText: Evil shall slay the wicked: and they that hate the righteous shall be desolate.

items.text: The LORD redeemeth the soul of his servants: and none of them that trust in him shall be desolate.
items.plainText: The LORD redeemeth the soul of his servants: and none of them that trust in him shall be desolate.
